subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A week after assigning three United States national team players to each of its seven franchises, Women’s Professional Soccer held its draft of international players in New York. Most in demand were players from Brazil, with 10 taken in the four rounds, 4 in the first round alone. After Brazil, Japan, with four, had the most players selected.
